077/**
078 *  The implementation for
079 *  {@link MethodSpec}.
080 *
081 *  @author Square,Inc.
082 *  @modified   Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
083 *  @version $Id: MethodSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $
084 *  @since 0.0.5
085 *
086 *  @UMLGraph.link
087 */
088@SuppressWarnings( {"ClassWithTooManyFields", "ClassWithTooManyMethods"} )
089@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: MethodSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $" )
090@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
091public final class MethodSpecImpl implements MethodSpec
092{
093        /*---------------*\
094    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
095        \*---------------*/
096    /**
097     *  The implementation for
098     *  {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.MethodSpec.Builder}
099     *
100     *  @author Square,Inc.
101     *  @modified   Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
102     *  @version $Id: MethodSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $
103     *  @since 0.0.5
104     *
105     *  @UMLGraph.link
106     */
107    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: MethodSpecImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $" )
108    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
109    public static final class BuilderImpl implements MethodSpec.Builder
110    {
111            /*------------*\
112        ====** Attributes **===================================================
113            \*------------*/
114        /**
115         *  The annotations for the method.
116         */
117        private final Collection<AnnotationSpecImpl> m_Annotations = new ArrayList<>();
118
119        /**
120         *  The code for the method.
121         */
122        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
123        private final CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl m_Code;
124
125        /**
126         *  The reference to the factory.
127         */
128        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
129        private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
130
131        /**
132         *  The default value for the method; this is for annotations only.
133         */
134        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
135        private CodeBlockImpl m_DefaultValue;
136
137        /**
138         *  The declared exceptions for the method.
139         */
140        private final Collection<TypeNameImpl> m_Exceptions = new LinkedHashSet<>();
141
142        /**
143         *  The Javadoc comment for the method.
144         */
145        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
146        private final CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl m_Javadoc;
147
148        /**
149         *  The modifiers for the method.
150         */
151        private final Set<Modifier> m_Modifiers = EnumSet.noneOf( Modifier.class );
152
153        /**
154         *  The name for the method.
155         */
156        private final String m_Name;
157
158        /**
159         *  The parameters for the method.
160         */
161        private final List<ParameterSpecImpl> m_Parameters = new ArrayList<>();
162
163        /**
164         *  The comment for the return value for the method.
165         */
166        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
167        private final CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl m_ReturnComment;
168
169        /**
170         *  The return type for the method.
171         */
172        @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
173        private TypeNameImpl m_ReturnType;
174
175        /**
176         *  The static imports.
177         */
178        private final Collection<String> m_StaticImports = new TreeSet<>();
179
180        /**
181         *  The type variables for the method.
182         */
183        private final Collection<TypeVariableNameImpl> m_TypeVariables = new ArrayList<>();
184
185        /**
186         *  The flag that indicates whether a parameter (the last one) is a
187         *  {@code varargs} parameter.
188         */
189        private boolean m_Varargs = false;
190
191            /*--------------*\
192        ====** Constructors **=================================================
193            \*--------------*/
194        /**
195         *  Creates a new {@code BuilderImpl} instance.
196         *
197         *  @param  composer    The reference to the factory that created this
198         *      builder instance.
199         *  @param  name    The name for the method.
200         */
201        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
202        public BuilderImpl( final JavaComposer composer, final CharSequence name )
203        {
204            m_Composer = requireNonNullArgument( composer, "composer" );
205            m_Name = requireValidArgument( requireNotEmptyArgument( name, "name" ), "name", v -> v.equals( CONSTRUCTOR ) || isValidName( v ), $ -> format( "not a valid name: %s", name ) ).toString().intern();
206            m_ReturnType = name.equals( CONSTRUCTOR ) ? null : VOID_PRIMITIVE;
207
208            m_Code = (CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder();
209            m_Javadoc = (CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder();
210            m_ReturnComment = (CodeBlockImpl.BuilderImpl) m_Composer.codeBlockBuilder();
211        }   //  BuilderImpl()
212
213            /*---------*\
214        ====** Methods **======================================================
215            \*---------*/
216        /**
217         *  {@inheritDoc}
218         */
219        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
220        @Override
221        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final AnnotationSpec annotationSpec )
222        {
223            m_Annotations.add( (AnnotationSpecImpl) requireNonNullArgument( annotationSpec, "annotationSpec" ) );
224
225            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
226            return this;
227        }   //  addAnnotation()
228
229        /**
230         *  {@inheritDoc}
231         */
232        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
233        @Override
234        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final Class<?> annotation )
235        {
236            return addAnnotation( ClassNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( annotation, "annotation" ) ) );
237        }   //  addAnnotation()
238
239        /**
240         *  {@inheritDoc}
241         */
242        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
243        @Override
244        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotation( final ClassName annotationClass )
245        {
246            final var annotation = (AnnotationSpecImpl) m_Composer.annotationBuilder( requireNonNullArgument( annotationClass, "annotationClass" ) )
247                .build();
248            m_Annotations.add( annotation );
249
250            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
251            return this;
252        }   //  addAnnotation()
253
254        /**
255         *  {@inheritDoc}
256         */
257        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
258        @Override
259        public final BuilderImpl addAnnotations( final Iterable<? extends AnnotationSpec> annotationSpecs )
260        {
261            for( final AnnotationSpec annotationSpec : requireNonNullArgument( annotationSpecs, "annotationSpecs" ) )
262            {
263                m_Annotations.add( (AnnotationSpecImpl) annotationSpec );
264            }
265
266            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
267            return this;
268        }   //  addAnnotations()
269
270        /**
271         *  {@inheritDoc}
272         */
273        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
274        @Override
275        public final BuilderImpl addCode( final CodeBlock codeBlock )
276        {
277            m_Code.add( requireNonNullArgument( codeBlock, "codeBlock" ) );
278
279            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
280            return this;
281        }   //  addCode()
282
283        /**
284         *  {@inheritDoc}
285         */
286        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
287        @Override
288        public final BuilderImpl addCode( final String format, final Object... args )
289        {
290            m_Code.add( format, args );
291
292            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
293            return this;
294        }   //  addCode()
295
296        /**
297         *  {@inheritDoc}
298         */
299        @SuppressWarnings( {"removal", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
300        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
301        @Override
302        @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.6" )
303        public final BuilderImpl addCode( final boolean addDebugOutput, final String format, final Object... args )
304        {
305            m_Code.add( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), format, args );
306
307            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
308            return this;
309        }   //  addCode()
310
311        /**
312         *  {@inheritDoc}
313         */
314        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
315        @Override
316        public final BuilderImpl addComment( final String format, final Object... args )
317        {
318            m_Code.addWithoutDebugInfo( "// " + requireNonNullArgument( format, "format" ) + "\n", args );
319
320            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
321            return this;
322        }   //  addComment()
323
324        /**
325         *  {@inheritDoc}
326         */
327        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
328        @Override
329        public final BuilderImpl addException( final Type exception )
330        {
331            return addException( TypeNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( exception, "exception" ) ) );
332        }   //  addException()
333

335         *  {@inheritDoc}
336         */

342
343            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
344            return this;
345        }   //  addException()
346

348         *  {@inheritDoc}
349         */

352        public final BuilderImpl addExceptions( final Iterable<? extends TypeName> exceptions )
353        {
354            for( final TypeName exception : requireNonNullArgument( exceptions, "exceptions" ) )

356                m_Exceptions.add( (TypeNameImpl) exception );
357            }
358
359            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
360            return this;
361        }   //  addExceptions()

371
372            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
373            return this;
374        }   //  addJavadoc()

380        @Override
381        public final BuilderImpl addJavadoc( final String format, final Object... args )

383            m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( format, args );
384
385            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
386            return this;
387        }   //  addJavadoc()
388
389        /**
390         *  {@inheritDoc}
391         */
392        @SuppressWarnings( {"BoundedWildcard", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
393        @Override
394        public final BuilderImpl addModifiers( final Iterable<Modifier> modifiers )
395        {
396            for( final var modifier : requireNonNullArgument( modifiers, "modifiers" ) )
397            {
398                m_Modifiers.add( modifier );
399            }
400
401            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
402            return this;
403        }   //  addModifiers()
404
405        /**
406         *  {@inheritDoc}
407         */
408        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
409        @Override
410        public final BuilderImpl addModifiers( final Modifier... modifiers )
411        {
412            addAll( m_Modifiers, requireNonNullArgument( modifiers, "modifiers" ) );
413
414            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
415            return this;
416        }   //  addModifiers()
417
418        /**
419         *  {@inheritDoc}
420         */

422        @Override
423        public final BuilderImpl addNamedCode( final String format, final Map<String,?> args )
424        {
425            m_Code.addNamed( format, args );
426
427            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
428            return this;
429        }   //  addNamedCode()
430

432         *  {@inheritDoc}

442        {
443            m_Code.addNamed( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), format, args );
444
445            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
446            return this;
447        }   //  addNamedCode()
448
449        /**

453        @Override
454        public final BuilderImpl addParameter( final ParameterSpec parameterSpec )

456            m_Parameters.add( (ParameterSpecImpl) requireNonNullArgument( parameterSpec, "parameterSpec" ) );
457
458            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------

462        /**
463         *  {@inheritDoc}
464         */
465        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
466        @Override
467        public final BuilderImpl addParameter( final Type type, final String name, final Modifier... modifiers )
468        {
469            return addParameter( TypeName.from( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ) ), name, modifiers );
470        }   //  addParameter()
471
472        /**
473         *  {@inheritDoc}
474         */
475        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
476        @Override
477        public final BuilderImpl addParameter( final TypeName type, final String name, final Modifier... modifiers )
478        {
479            final var parameter =  m_Composer.parameterBuilder( type, name, modifiers )
480                .build();
481            final var retValue = addParameter( parameter );
482
483            //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
484            return retValue;
485        }   //  addParameter()
486
487        /**
488         *  {@inheritDoc}
489         */
490        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
491        @Override
492        public final BuilderImpl addParameters( final Iterable<? extends ParameterSpec> parameterSpecs )
493        {
494            for( final ParameterSpec parameterSpec : requireNonNullArgument( parameterSpecs, "parameterSpecs" ) )
495            {
496                m_Parameters.add( (ParameterSpecImpl) parameterSpec );
497            }
498
499            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
500            return this;
501        }   //  addParameters()
502
503        /**
504         *  {@inheritDoc}
505         */
506        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
507        @Override
508        public final BuilderImpl addStatement( final CodeBlock statement )
509        {
510            m_Code.addStatement( requireNonNullArgument( statement, "statement" ) );
511
512            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
513            return this;
514        }   //  addStatement()

524
525            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------

527        }   //  addStatement()

537        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
538        @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.6" )
539        public final BuilderImpl addStatement( final boolean addDebugOutput, final String format, final Object... args )
540        {
541            m_Code.addStatement( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), format, args );
542
543            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
544            return this;

546
547        /**
548         *  {@inheritDoc}
549         */
550        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
551        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
552        @Override
553        public final MethodSpecImpl.BuilderImpl addStaticImport( final Class<?> clazz, final String... names )
554        {
555            return addStaticImport( ClassNameImpl.from( clazz ), names );
556        }   //  addStaticImport()
557
558        /**
559         *  {@inheritDoc}
560         */
561        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
562        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
563        @Override
564        public final MethodSpecImpl.BuilderImpl addStaticImport( final ClassName className, final String... names )
565        {
566            final var canonicalName = requireNonNullArgument( className, "className" ).canonicalName();
567            for( final var name : requireValidNonNullArgument( names, "names", v -> v.length > 0, n -> format( "%s array is empty", n ) ) )
568            {
569                m_StaticImports.add(
570                    format(
571                        "%s.%s",
572                        canonicalName,
573                        requireValidArgument(
574                            name,
575                            "name",
576                            Objects::nonNull,
577                            $ -> format( "null entry in names array: %s", Arrays.toString( names ) )
578                        )
579                    )
580                );
581            }
582
583            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
584            return this;
585        }   //  addStaticImport()
586
587        /**
588         *  {@inheritDoc}
589         */
590        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
591        @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
592        @Override
593        public final MethodSpecImpl.BuilderImpl addStaticImport( final Enum<?> constant )
594        {
595            return addStaticImport( ClassNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( constant, "constant" ).getDeclaringClass() ), constant.name() );
596        }   //  addStaticImport()
597
598        /**
599         *  {@inheritDoc}

619            {
620                m_TypeVariables.add( (TypeVariableNameImpl) typeVariable );
621            }
622
623            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
624            return this;

627        /**
628         *  {@inheritDoc}
629         */
630        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
631        @Override
632        public final BuilderImpl beginControlFlow( final String controlFlow, final Object... args )
633        {
634            m_Code.beginControlFlow( controlFlow, args );
635
636            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
637            return this;
638        }   //  beginControlFlow()
639
640        /**
641         *  {@inheritDoc}
642         *
643         *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
644         *      {@link JavaComposer}.
645         */
646        @SuppressWarnings( {"removal", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
647        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
648        @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.6" )
649        @Override
650        public final BuilderImpl beginControlFlow( final boolean addDebugOutput, final String format, final Object... args )
651        {
652            m_Code.beginControlFlow( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), format, args );
653
654            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
655            return this;
656        }   //  beginControlFlow()
657
658        /**
659         *  {@inheritDoc}
660         */
661        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
662        @Override
663        public final MethodSpecImpl build()
664        {
665            /*
666             * A method with a body cannot be abstract.
667             * We remove the modifier abstract here so that
668             * MethodSpec.toBuilder() will work properly.
669             */
670            if( !m_Code.isEmpty() )
671            {
672                m_Modifiers.remove( ABSTRACT );
673            }
674            final var retValue = new MethodSpecImpl( this );
675
676            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
677            return retValue;
678        }   //  build()
679
680        /**
681         *  {@inheritDoc}
682         */
683        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
684        @Override
685        public final BuilderImpl defaultValue( final CodeBlock defaultValue )
686        {
687            checkState( isNull( m_DefaultValue ), () -> new IllegalStateException( "defaultValue was already set" ) );
688            var codeBlockImpl = (CodeBlockImpl) requireNonNullArgument( defaultValue, "defaultValue" );
689            if( m_Composer.addDebugOutput() )
690            {
691                codeBlockImpl = (CodeBlockImpl) createDebugOutput( true )
692                    .map( DebugOutput::asComment )
693                    .map( m_Composer::codeBlockOf )
694                    .map( block -> block.join( " ", defaultValue ) )
695                    .orElse( defaultValue );
696            }
697            m_DefaultValue = codeBlockImpl;
698
699            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
700            return this;
701        }   //  defaultValue()
702
703        /**
704         *  {@inheritDoc}
705         */
706        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
707        @Override
708        public final BuilderImpl defaultValue( final String format, final Object... args )
709        {
710            return defaultValue( m_Composer.codeBlockOf( format, args ) );
711        }   //  defaultValue()
712
713        /**
714         *  {@inheritDoc}
715         */
716        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
717        @Override
718        public final BuilderImpl endControlFlow()
719        {
720            m_Code.endControlFlow();
721
722            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
723            return this;
724        }   //  endControlFlow()
725
726        /**
727         *  {@inheritDoc}
728         */
729        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
730        @Override
731        public final BuilderImpl endControlFlow( final String controlFlow, final Object... args )
732        {
733            m_Code.endControlFlow( controlFlow, args );
734
735            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
736            return this;
737        }   //  endControlFlow()
738
739        /**
740         *  {@inheritDoc}
741         *
742         *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
743         *      {@link JavaComposer}.
744         */
745        @SuppressWarnings( {"removal", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
746        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
747        @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.6" )
748        @Override
749        public final BuilderImpl endControlFlow( final boolean addDebugOutput, final String format, final Object... args )
750        {
751            m_Code.endControlFlow( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), format, args );
752
753            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
754            return this;
755        }   //  endControlFlow()
756
757        /**
758         *  Returns <i>a reference to</i> the declared exceptions.
759         *
760         *  @return The exceptions.
761         */
762        @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "AssignmentOrReturnOfFieldWithMutableType"} )
763        public final Collection<TypeNameImpl> exceptions()
764        {
765            return m_Exceptions ;
766        }   //  exceptions()
767
768        /**
769         *  {@inheritDoc}
770         */
771        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
772        @Override
773        public final BuilderImpl nextControlFlow( final String controlFlow, final Object... args )
774        {
775            m_Code.nextControlFlow( controlFlow, args );
776
777            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
778            return this;
779        }   //  nextControlFlow()
780
781        /**
782         *  {@inheritDoc}
783         *
784         *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
785         *      {@link JavaComposer}.
786         */
787        @SuppressWarnings( {"removal", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
788        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
789        @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.6" )
790        @Override
791        public final BuilderImpl nextControlFlow( final boolean addDebugOutput, final String format, final Object... args )
792        {
793            m_Code.nextControlFlow( createDebugOutput( addDebugOutput, true ), format, args );
794
795            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
796            return this;
797        }   //  nextControlFlow()
798
799        /**
800         *  Returns <i>a reference to</i>the parameters.
801         *
802         *  @return The parameters.
803         */
804        @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "AssignmentOrReturnOfFieldWithMutableType"} )
805        public final List<ParameterSpecImpl> parameters()
806        {
807            return m_Parameters;
808        }   //  parameters()
809        /**
810         *  {@inheritDoc}
811         */
812        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
813        @Override
814        public final BuilderImpl returns( final Type returnType )
815        {
816            return returns( TypeNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( returnType, "returnType" ) ) );
817        }   //  returns()
818
819        /**
820         *  {@inheritDoc}
821         */
822        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
823        @Override
824        public final BuilderImpl returns( final Type returnType, final String format, final Object... args )
825        {
826            return returns( TypeNameImpl.from( requireNonNullArgument( returnType, "returnType" ) ), format, args );
827        }   //  returns()
828
829        /**
830         *  {@inheritDoc}
831         */
832        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
833        @Override
834        public final BuilderImpl returns( final TypeName returnType )
835        {
836            checkState( !m_Name.equals( CONSTRUCTOR ), () -> new IllegalStateException( "constructor cannot have return type." ) );
837            m_ReturnType = (TypeNameImpl) requireNonNullArgument( returnType, "returnType" );
838            createDebugOutput( m_Composer.addDebugOutput() )
839                .ifPresent( debug -> m_ReturnComment.addWithoutDebugInfo( debug.asLiteral() ) );
840
841            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
842            return this;
843        }   //  returns()
844
845        /**
846         *  {@inheritDoc}
847         */
848        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
849        @Override
850        public final BuilderImpl returns( final TypeName returnType, final String format, final Object... args )
851        {
852            returns( returnType );
853            m_ReturnComment.addWithoutDebugInfo( format, args );
854
855            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
856            return this;
857        }   //  returns()
858
859        /**
860         *  {@inheritDoc}
861         */
862        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
863        @Override
864        public final BuilderImpl varargs() { return varargs( true ); }
865
866        /**
867         *  {@inheritDoc}
868         */
869        @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
870        @Override
871        public final BuilderImpl varargs( final boolean varargs )
872        {
873            m_Varargs = varargs;
874
875            //---* Done *------------------------------------------------------
876            return this;
877        }   //  varargs()
878    }
879    //  class BuilderImpl
880
881        /*------------*\
882    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
883        \*------------*/
884    /**
885     *  The annotations of this method.
886     */
887    private final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> m_Annotations;
888
889    /**
890     *  Lazily initialised return value of
891     *  {@link #toString()}
892     *  for this instance.
893     */
894    private final Lazy<String> m_CachedString;
895
896    /**
897     *  The code of this method.
898     */
899    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
900    private final CodeBlockImpl m_Code;
901
902    /**
903     *  The reference to the factory.
904     */
905    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
906    private final JavaComposer m_Composer;
907
908    /**
909     *  The default value of this method; only applicable for annotations.
910     */
911    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
912    private final Optional<CodeBlockImpl> m_DefaultValue;
913
914    /**
915     *  The declared exceptions for this method.
916     */
917    private final List<TypeNameImpl> m_Exceptions;
918
919    /**
920     *  The Javadoc comment of this method.
921     */
922    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
923    private final CodeBlockImpl m_Javadoc;
924
925    /**
926     *  The modifiers of this method.
927     */
928    private final Set<Modifier> m_Modifiers;
929
930    /**
931     *  The name of this method.
932     */
933    private final String m_Name;
934
935    /**
936     *  The parameters of this method.
937     */
938    private final List<ParameterSpecImpl> m_Parameters;
939
940    /**
941     *  The comment for the return value of the method.
942     */
943    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
944    private final CodeBlockImpl m_ReturnComment;
945
946    /**
947     *  The return type of the method.
948     */
949    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
950    private final TypeNameImpl m_ReturnType;
951
952    /**
953     *  The static imports.
954     */
955    private final Set<String> m_StaticImports;
956
957    /**
958     *  The type variables of this method.
959     */
960    private final List<TypeVariableNameImpl> m_TypeVariables;
961
962    /**
963     *  The flag that indicates whether a parameter (the last one) is a
964     *  {@code varargs} parameter.
965     */
966    private final boolean m_Varargs;
967
968        /*--------------*\
969    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
970        \*--------------*/
971    /**
972     *  Creates a new {@code MethodSpecImpl} instance.
973     *
974     *  @param  builder The builder.
975     */
976    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject", "CastToConcreteClass"} )
977    public MethodSpecImpl( final BuilderImpl builder )
978    {
979        checkState( !builder.m_Varargs || lastParameterIsArray( builder.m_Parameters ), () -> new ValidationException( format( "last parameter of varargs method %s must be an array", builder.m_Name ) ) );
980
981        final var code = builder.m_Code.build();
982        checkState( code.isEmpty() || !builder.m_Modifiers.contains( ABSTRACT ), () -> new ValidationException( format( "abstract method %s cannot have code", builder.m_Name ) ) );
983
984        m_Composer = builder.m_Composer;
985        m_Name = builder.m_Name;
986        m_Javadoc = builder.m_Javadoc.build();
987        m_Annotations = List.copyOf( builder.m_Annotations );
988        m_Modifiers = Set.copyOf( builder.m_Modifiers );
989        m_TypeVariables = List.copyOf( builder.m_TypeVariables );
990        m_ReturnType = builder.m_ReturnType;
991        m_ReturnComment = builder.m_ReturnComment.build();
992        m_Parameters = List.copyOf( builder.parameters() );
993        m_Varargs = builder.m_Varargs;
994        m_Exceptions = List.copyOf( builder.exceptions() );
995        m_DefaultValue = Optional.ofNullable( builder.m_DefaultValue );
996        m_Code = code;
997
998        final Collection<String> staticImports = new HashSet<>( builder.m_StaticImports );
999        staticImports.addAll( m_Javadoc.getStaticImports() );
1000        staticImports.addAll( m_ReturnComment.getStaticImports() );
1001        m_Parameters.stream()
1002            .map( ParameterSpecImpl::javadoc )
1003            .filter( Optional::isPresent )
1004            .map( j -> j.map( c -> (CodeBlockImpl) c ).get().getStaticImports() )
1005            .forEach( staticImports::addAll );
1006        m_DefaultValue.ifPresent( c -> staticImports.addAll( c.getStaticImports() ) );
1007        staticImports.addAll( m_Code.getStaticImports() );
1008        m_StaticImports = Set.copyOf( staticImports );
1009
1010        m_CachedString = Lazy.use( this::initializeCachedString );
1011    }   //  MethodSpecImpl()
1012
1013        /*---------*\
1014    ====** Methods **==========================================================
1015        \*---------*/
1016    /**
1017     *  Creates a builder that builds an instance of {@code MethodSpec} for a
1018     *  constructor.
1019     *
1020     *  @return The builder.
1021     *
1022     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
1023     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
1024     */
1025    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
1026    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
1027    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
1028    public static final BuilderImpl constructorBuilder()
1029    {
1030        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( new JavaComposer(), CONSTRUCTOR );
1031
1032        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1033        return retValue;
1034    }   //  constructorBuilder()
1035
1036    /**
1037     *  Returns the default value of this method.
1038     *
1039     *  @return An instance of
1040     *      {@link Optional}
1041     *      that holds the default value.
1042     */
1043    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
1044    public final Optional<CodeBlockImpl> defaultValue() { return m_DefaultValue; }
1045
1046    /**
1047     *  Emits the Javadoc to the given code writer.
1048     *
1049     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
1050     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
1051     *      output target.
1052     */
1053    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
1054    private final void emitJavadoc( final CodeWriter codeWriter ) throws UncheckedIOException
1055    {
1056        final var javaDocBuilder = m_Javadoc.toBuilder();
1057        var addNewLine = false;
1058        @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent", "CastToConcreteClass"} )
1059        final var paramComments = m_Parameters.stream()
1060            .filter( p -> p.javadoc().isPresent() )
1061            .map( p -> (CodeBlockImpl) p.javadoc().get() )
1062            .toArray( CodeBlockImpl[]::new );
1063        addNewLine = paramComments.length > 0;
1064        for( final var comment : paramComments )
1065        {
1066            javaDocBuilder.add( comment );
1067        }
1068        if( !m_ReturnComment.isEmpty() )
1069        {
1070            javaDocBuilder.add( m_Composer.codeBlockOf( "\n@return $L", m_ReturnComment ) );
1071            addNewLine = true;
1072        }
1073        if( addNewLine ) javaDocBuilder.add( "\n" );
1074        codeWriter.emitJavadoc( javaDocBuilder.build() );
1075    }   //  emitJavadoc()
1076
1077    /**
1078     *  Emits this method to the given code writer.
1079     *
1080     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
1081     *  @param  enclosingName   The name of the type that owns this method.
1082     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers for this method.
1083     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
1084     *      output target.
1085     */
1086    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
1087    public final void emit( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final Optional<String> enclosingName, final Collection<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException
1088    {
1089        switch( codeWriter.layout() )
1090        {
1091            case LAYOUT_FOUNDATION -> emit4Foundation( codeWriter, enclosingName, implicitModifiers );
1092            case LAYOUT_DEFAULT, LAYOUT_JAVAPOET, LAYOUT_JAVAPOET_WITH_TAB -> emit4JavaPoet( codeWriter, enclosingName, implicitModifiers );
1093            default -> throw new UnsupportedEnumError( codeWriter.layout() );
1094        }
1095    }   //  emit()
1096
1097    /**
1098     *  Emits this method to the given code writer, using the Foundation
1099     *  layout.
1100     *
1101     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
1102     *  @param  enclosingName   The name of the type that owns this method.
1103     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers for this method.
1104     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
1105     *      output target.
1106     */
1107    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
1108    private final void emit4Foundation( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final Optional<String> enclosingName, final Collection<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException
1109    {
1110        emitJavadoc( codeWriter );
1111        codeWriter.emitAnnotations( m_Annotations, false );
1112        codeWriter.emitModifiers( m_Modifiers, implicitModifiers );
1113
1114        if( !m_TypeVariables.isEmpty() )
1115        {
1116            codeWriter.emitTypeVariables( m_TypeVariables );
1117            codeWriter.emit( " " );
1118        }
1119
1120        if( isConstructor() )
1121        {
1122            /*
1123             * Anonymous types do not have a constructor, therefore there is
1124             * no check required for the name.
1125             */
1126            //noinspection OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent
1127            codeWriter.emit( "$L", enclosingName.get() );
1128        }
1129        else
1130        {
1131            codeWriter.emit( "$T $L", m_ReturnType, m_Name );
1132        }
1133
1134        if( !m_Parameters.isEmpty() )
1135        {
1136            codeWriter.emit( "( " );
1137            var firstParameter = true;
1138            //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
1139            for( final var i = m_Parameters.iterator(); i.hasNext(); )
1140            {
1141                final var parameter = i.next();
1142                if( !firstParameter ) codeWriter.emit( "," ).emitWrappingSpace();
1143                parameter.emit( codeWriter, !i.hasNext() && m_Varargs );
1144                firstParameter = false;
1145            }
1146            codeWriter.emit( " )" );
1147        }
1148        else
1149        {
1150            codeWriter.emit( "()" );
1151        }
1152
1153        if( m_DefaultValue.isPresent() && !m_DefaultValue.get().isEmpty() )
1154        {
1155            codeWriter.emit( " default " );
1156            codeWriter.emit( m_DefaultValue.get() );
1157        }
1158
1159        if( !m_Exceptions.isEmpty() )
1160        {
1161            codeWriter.emitWrappingSpace().emit( "throws" );
1162            var firstException = true;
1163            for( final var exception : m_Exceptions )
1164            {
1165                if( !firstException ) codeWriter.emit( "," );
1166                codeWriter.emitWrappingSpace().emit( "$T", exception );
1167                firstException = false;
1168            }
1169        }
1170
1171        if( hasModifier( ABSTRACT ) )
1172        {
1173            codeWriter.emit( ";\n" );
1174        }
1175        else if( hasModifier( NATIVE ) )
1176        {
1177            //---* Code is allowed to support stuff like GWT JSNI *------------
1178            codeWriter.emit( m_Code );
1179            codeWriter.emit( ";\n" );
1180        }
1181        else
1182        {
1183            codeWriter.emit( "\n{" );
1184
1185            if( !m_Code.isEmpty() )
1186            {
1187                codeWriter.emit( "\n" )
1188                    .indent()
1189                    .emit( m_Code )
1190                    .unindent();
1191            }
1192
1193            if( isConstructor() )
1194            {
1195                //noinspection OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent
1196                codeWriter.emit( "}  //  $L()\n", enclosingName.get() );
1197            }
1198            else
1199            {
1200                codeWriter.emit( "}  //  $L()\n", m_Name );
1201            }
1202        }
1203    }   //  emit4Foundation()
1204
1205    /**
1206     *  Emits this method to the given code writer, using the JavaPoet layout.
1207     *
1208     *  @param  codeWriter  The code writer.
1209     *  @param  enclosingName   The name of the type that owns this method.
1210     *  @param  implicitModifiers   The implicit modifiers for this method.
1211     *  @throws UncheckedIOException A problem occurred when writing to the
1212     *      output target.
1213     */
1214    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
1215    private final void emit4JavaPoet( final CodeWriter codeWriter, final Optional<String> enclosingName, final Collection<Modifier> implicitModifiers ) throws UncheckedIOException
1216    {
1217        emitJavadoc( codeWriter );
1218        codeWriter.emitAnnotations( m_Annotations, false );
1219        codeWriter.emitModifiers( m_Modifiers, implicitModifiers );
1220
1221        if( !m_TypeVariables.isEmpty() )
1222        {
1223            codeWriter.emitTypeVariables( m_TypeVariables );
1224            codeWriter.emit( " " );
1225        }
1226
1227        if( isConstructor() )
1228        {
1229            /*
1230             * Anonymous types do not have a constructor, therefore there is
1231             * no check required for the name.
1232             */
1233            //noinspection OptionalGetWithoutIsPresent
1234            codeWriter.emit( "$L($Z", enclosingName.get() );
1235        }
1236        else
1237        {
1238            codeWriter.emit( "$T $L($Z", m_ReturnType, m_Name );
1239        }
1240
1241        var firstParameter = true;
1242        //noinspection ForLoopWithMissingComponent
1243        for( final var i = m_Parameters.iterator(); i.hasNext(); )
1244        {
1245            final var parameter = i.next();
1246            if( !firstParameter ) codeWriter.emit( "," ).emitWrappingSpace();
1247            parameter.emit( codeWriter, !i.hasNext() && m_Varargs );
1248            firstParameter = false;
1249        }
1250
1251        codeWriter.emit( ")" );
1252
1253        if( m_DefaultValue.isPresent() && !m_DefaultValue.get().isEmpty() )
1254        {
1255            codeWriter.emit( " default " );
1256            codeWriter.emit( m_DefaultValue.get() );
1257        }
1258
1259        if( !m_Exceptions.isEmpty() )
1260        {
1261            codeWriter.emitWrappingSpace().emit( "throws" );
1262            var firstException = true;
1263            for( final var exception : m_Exceptions )
1264            {
1265                if( !firstException ) codeWriter.emit( "," );
1266                codeWriter.emitWrappingSpace().emit( "$T", exception );
1267                firstException = false;
1268            }
1269        }
1270
1271        if( hasModifier( ABSTRACT ) )
1272        {
1273            codeWriter.emit( ";\n" );
1274        }
1275        else if( hasModifier( NATIVE ) )
1276        {
1277            //---* Code is allowed to support stuff like GWT JSNI *------------
1278            codeWriter.emit( m_Code );
1279            codeWriter.emit( ";\n" );
1280        }
1281        else
1282        {
1283            codeWriter.emit( " {\n" );
1284
1285            codeWriter.indent();
1286            codeWriter.emit( m_Code );
1287            codeWriter.unindent();
1288
1289            codeWriter.emit( "}\n" );
1290        }
1291    }   //  emit4JavaPoet()
1292
1293    /**
1294     *  {@inheritDoc}
1295     */
1296    @Override
1297    public final boolean equals( final Object o )
1298    {
1299        var retValue = this == o;
1300        if( !retValue && (o instanceof MethodSpecImpl other) )
1301        {
1302            retValue = m_Composer.equals( other.m_Composer ) && toString().equals( o.toString() );
1303        }
1304
1305        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1306        return retValue;
1307    }   //  equals()
1308
1309    /**
1310     *  Returns the declared exceptions for this method.
1311     *
1312     *  @return The declared exceptions.
1313     */
1314    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
1315    public final List<TypeNameImpl> exceptions() { return m_Exceptions; }
1316
1317    /**
1318     *  Returns the
1319     *  {@link JavaComposer}
1320     *  factory.
1321     *
1322     *  @return The reference to the factory.
1323     */
1324    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
1325    public final JavaComposer getFactory() { return m_Composer; }
1326
1327    /**
1328     *  Returns the static imports for this code block.
1329     *
1330     *  @return The static imports.
1331     */
1332    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
1333    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.2.0" )
1334    public final Set<String> getStaticImports() { return m_StaticImports; }
1335
1336    /**
1337     *  {@inheritDoc}
1338     */
1339    @Override
1340    public final int hashCode() { return hash( m_Composer, toString() ); }
1341
1342    /**
1343     *  {@inheritDoc}
1344     */
1345    @Override
1346    public final boolean hasModifier( final Modifier modifier ) { return m_Modifiers.contains( requireNonNullArgument( modifier, "modifier" ) ); }
1347
1348    /**
1349     *  The initializer for
1350     *  {@link #m_CachedString}.
1351     *
1352     *  @return The return value for
1353     *      {@link #toString()}.
1354     */
1355    private final String initializeCachedString()
1356    {
1357        final var resultBuilder = new StringBuilder();
1358        final var codeWriter = new CodeWriter( m_Composer, resultBuilder );
1359        try
1360        {
1361            emit( codeWriter, Optional.of( "Constructor" ), Set.of() );
1362        }
1363        catch( final UncheckedIOException e )
1364        {
1365            throw new UnexpectedExceptionError( e.getCause() );
1366        }
1367        final var retValue = resultBuilder.toString();
1368
1369        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1370        return retValue;
1371    }   //  initializeCachedString()
1372
1373    /**
1374     *  {@inheritDoc}
1375     */
1376    @Override
1377    public final boolean isConstructor() { return m_Name.equals( CONSTRUCTOR ); }
1378
1379    /**
1380     *  Checks whether the last entry of the given parameter list is an array.
1381     *
1382     *  @param  parameters  The parameter list.
1383     *  @return {@code true} if the last entry of the given parameter list is
1384     *      an array type, {@code false} if not.
1385     */
1386    private static final boolean lastParameterIsArray( final List<ParameterSpecImpl> parameters )
1387    {
1388        final var retValue = !parameters.isEmpty() && TypeName.asArray( (parameters.get( parameters.size() - 1 ).type() ) ).isPresent();
1389
1390        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1391        return retValue;
1392    }   //  lastParameterIsArray()
1393
1394    /**
1395     *  Returns a builder for a regular method.
1396     *
1397     *  @param  name    The name for the method.
1398     *  @return The builder.
1399     *
1400     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
1401     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
1402     */
1403    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
1404    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
1405    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
1406    public static final BuilderImpl methodBuilder( final CharSequence name )
1407    {
1408        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( new JavaComposer(), name );
1409
1410        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1411        return retValue;
1412    }   //  methodBuilder()
1413
1414    /**
1415     *  {@inheritDoc}
1416     */
1417    @Override
1418    public final Set<Modifier> modifiers() { return m_Modifiers; }
1419
1420    /**
1421     *  {@inheritDoc}
1422     */
1423    @Override
1424    public final String name() { return m_Name; }
1425
1426    /**
1427     *  <p>{@summary Returns a new method spec builder for a method that
1428     *  overrides the given method.}</p>
1429     *  <p>This new builder will copy visibility modifiers, type parameters,
1430     *  return type, name, parameters, and throws declarations. An
1431     *  {@link Override}
1432     *  annotation will be added.</p>
1433     *
1434     *  @note   In JavaPoet&nbsp;1.2 through 1.7 this method retained
1435     *      annotations from the method and parameters of the overridden
1436     *      method. Since JavaPoet&nbsp;1.8 and in JavaComposer annotations
1437     *      must be added separately.
1438     *
1439     *  @param  method  The method to override.
1440     *  @return The builder.
1441     *
1442     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
1443     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
1444     */
1445    @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
1446    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
1447    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
1448    public static final BuilderImpl overriding( final ExecutableElement method )
1449    {
1450        final var composer = new JavaComposer();
1451        final var retValue = (BuilderImpl) composer.overridingMethodBuilder( method );
1452
1453        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1454        return retValue;
1455    }   //  overriding()
1456
1457    /**
1458     *  <p>{@summary Returns a new method spec builder that overrides the given
1459     *  method as a member of of the given enclosing class.} This will resolve
1460     *  type parameters: for example overriding
1461     *  {@link Comparable#compareTo}
1462     *  in a type that implements {@code Comparable<Movie>}, the {@code T}
1463     *  parameter will be resolved to {@code Movie}.</p>
1464     *  <p>This will copy its visibility modifiers, type parameters, return
1465     *  type, name, parameters, and throws declarations. An
1466     *  {@link Override}
1467     *  annotation will be added.</p>
1468     *
1469     *  @note   In JavaPoet&nbsp;1.2 through 1.7 this method retained
1470     *      annotations from the method and parameters of the overridden
1471     *      method. Since JavaPoet&nbsp;1.8 and in JavaComposer annotations
1472     *      must be added separately.
1473     *
1474     *  @param  method  The method to override.
1475     *  @param  enclosing   The enclosing class for the method.
1476     *  @param  types   The type variables.
1477     *  @return The builder.
1478     *
1479     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
1480     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
1481     */
1482    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
1483    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject", "CastToConcreteClass"} )
1484    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
1485    public static final BuilderImpl overriding( final ExecutableElement method, final DeclaredType enclosing, final Types types )
1486    {
1487        final var composer = new JavaComposer();
1488        final var retValue = (BuilderImpl) composer.overridingMethodBuilder( method, enclosing, types );
1489
1490        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1491        return retValue;
1492    }   //  overriding()
1493
1494    /**
1495     *  <p>{@summary Returns a new method spec builder for a method that
1496     *  overrides the given method.}</p>
1497     *  <p>This new builder will copy visibility modifiers, type parameters,
1498     *  return type, name, parameters, and throws declarations. An
1499     *  {@link Override}
1500     *  annotation will be added, but any other annotation will be omitted;
1501     *  this is consistent with the behaviour of
1502     *  {@link #overriding(ExecutableElement)}
1503     *  and
1504     *  {@link #overriding(ExecutableElement, DeclaredType, Types)}.</p>
1505     *
1506     *  @param  method  The method to override.
1507     *  @return The builder.
1508     *
1509     *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the introduction of
1510     *      {@link JavaComposer}.
1511     */
1512    @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
1513    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
1514    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.8" )
1515    public static final BuilderImpl overriding( final Method method )
1516    {
1517        final var composer = new JavaComposer();
1518        final var retValue = (BuilderImpl) composer.overridingMethodBuilder( method );
1519
1520        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1521        return retValue;
1522    }   //  overriding()
1523
1524    /**
1525     *  {@inheritDoc}
1526     */
1527    @Override
1528    public final Collection<ParameterSpec> parameters() { return List.copyOf( m_Parameters ); }
1529
1530    /**
1531     *  {@inheritDoc}
1532     */
1533    @Override
1534    public final TypeName returnType()
1535    {
1536        final var retValue = nonNull( m_ReturnType ) ? m_ReturnType : VOID_PRIMITIVE;
1537
1538        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1539        return retValue;
1540    }   //  returnType()
1541
1542    /**
1543     *  {@inheritDoc}
1544     */
1545    @Override
1546    public final String signature()
1547    {
1548        final var joiner = new StringJoiner( ", ", format( "%s( ", name() ), " )" );
1549        joiner.setEmptyValue( format( "%s()", name() ) );
1550        m_Parameters.stream()
1551            .map( parameter -> parameter.type().toString() )
1552            .forEach( joiner::add );
1553        final var retValue = joiner.toString();
1554
1555        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1556        return retValue;
1557    }   //  signature()
1558
1559    /**
1560     *  {@inheritDoc}
1561     */
1562    @SuppressWarnings( {"AccessingNonPublicFieldOfAnotherObject", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
1563    @Override
1564    public final BuilderImpl toBuilder( final boolean omitCode )
1565    {
1566        final var retValue = new BuilderImpl( m_Composer, m_Name );
1567        retValue.m_Javadoc.addWithoutDebugInfo( m_Javadoc );
1568        retValue.m_Annotations.addAll( m_Annotations );
1569        retValue.m_Modifiers.addAll( m_Modifiers );
1570        if( omitCode ) retValue.m_Modifiers.add( ABSTRACT );
1571        retValue.m_TypeVariables.addAll( m_TypeVariables );
1572        retValue.m_ReturnType = m_ReturnType;
1573        retValue.m_ReturnComment.addWithoutDebugInfo( m_ReturnComment );
1574        retValue.m_Parameters.addAll( m_Parameters );
1575        retValue.m_Exceptions.addAll( m_Exceptions );
1576        if( !omitCode ) retValue.m_Code.addWithoutDebugInfo( m_Code );
1577        retValue.m_Varargs = m_Varargs;
1578        retValue.m_DefaultValue = m_DefaultValue.orElse( null );
1579        retValue.m_StaticImports.addAll( m_StaticImports );
1580
1581        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
1582        return retValue;
1583    }   //  toBuilder()
1584
1585    /**
1586     *  {@inheritDoc}
1587     */
1588    @Override
1589    public final String toString() { return m_CachedString.get(); }
1590}
1591//  class MethodSpecImpl
1592

1594 *  End of File
